sec.title: Static calculation for the operator protective structure
sec.p: The protective structure shall be designed to have a minimum structural capacity to elastically support a rated design load of:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: vertical load - a static uniform load of 8,2 tonnes, or a force equivalent to a static load of 105Â kPa, distributed uniformly over the greatest plan view area of the operator canopy roof, whichever is the lesser; and

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: horizontal load - a static uniform load of two tonnes applied horizontally to the edge of the operator canopy roof in both longitudinal and lateral directions.
